issues_reports.text: @maybevaleria damn, nah i got t-mobile 😭😭
@Echilees4life @TMobileHelp I’m gonna let as many people know as possible how terrible a company they are

@RebeccaAlvarez_ @SoniaSAT425 Canceled T-Mobile service due to their Vax mandates or be fired .  I can’t support this crap. Hone who is working for them should quit and leave.  It’s unAmerican to support these unconstitutional mandates.
Keivonya with @TMobileHelp @TMobile has terrible customer service and you all do not help your customers at all!!! you lie about promotions and this is why your company is failing

@Chaosxsilencer Played for free when T-Mobile gave a free preview for two months thought it was worst than xcloud and never played it again. As usual google killed something it started hope people can get money back or something from google if they bought in

@danielleradford @TMobileHelp Use to work for T-Mobile. You can call your team of experts line, have a human help you get a replacement, can get it sent directly to you or nearest store 💖 

Either way, contacting their team of experts is usually the way to go! Hope this helped! 🥰

@JoelWA384 @TMobile I go between San Antonio and Austin and it’s the same everywhere i go. I need to compare with others in the area. @VerizonSupport hasn’t been helpful at all in figuring out why I’m getting such crap service. They even said it was congestion, but you’re in Cincinnati.

@TMobileHelp I talked to everyone I could. I'm just waiting and hoping an update that fixes the issue is sent soon. I had to borrow a phone just to use. I'm not mad, just disappointed that it was not addressed to the employees so they wouldn't make us factory reset when we didn't need to.

I broke down, @TMobile is offering a 1000 dollars for a trade in towards a #GalaxyS22Ultra preorder and I totally jumped on that.  Will miss my SD card but did get the 512 gb model and an actual drop in my monthly bill.

@TMobileHelp purchased the T-Mobile variant from Samsung directly, Samsung locked the device. Called 3 times T-Mobile and they say they can not help me to unlock and called Samsung they say call T-Mobile. It’s back and fourth, fully paid - Imei - 355181113855406.

@SamsungSupport @ChrisNarvaez Lovely Enri, but fed up with process. Been Samsung customer since original Galaxy & every even numberd phone release thereafter.  Was supposed to receive a $50 pre-reg credit email from y'all before release date too and never got one. Even went to T-Mobile today, no help!
@DollyParton @TMobile @MileyCyrus A T-Mobile cancelation? I want to pay for cell service.  Not celebrity appearances

@TMobile my mother has gotten screwed over and been trying to address it but it’s been dragged out over a year and now that it’s passed that there’s no more options and nothing can be done? While during that time she was taken advantage of? It should be an easy clear fix! Help!
@TMobileHelp need help adding T-Mobile Work Perks to my account, can you provide any assistance?
T-Mobile is literally a piece of ****
@TMobileHelp My person information was compromised from this T-Mobile data breach and I’m not the only one. T-Mobile needs to do something about it. Lock down our info!
@TMobileHelp Is there an official way to report bad service at certain locations?
T-Mobile service is so trash 😒

Repeating myself at work repeating myself with att. I am so sick and tired of repeating myself. Im speaking correctly and pronouncing my words clearly. Why is it I have to constantly repeat myself? I swear I should just go back to T-Mobile Atleast they fix issues.

Apple’s 13 is the worst design I’ve had to deal with the phone keeps turning on so it can use the camera and try to watch you through “Face ID” what bs and T-Mobile platform needs another class action lawsuit as this is a brand new phone and they told me to bring it in to replace

@TMobileHelp You’re joking right? I was a customer 15 years ago and you just leaked information you shouldn’t even have to someone who out it on the dark web. Full SSN, license, name and address. Then have the audacity to say you care about security.

So @TMobile has a data breach. SSN, driver’s license, etc is exposed. They don’t bother notifying us and when @Chase notifies me (thankfully) and I look into freezing my credit/protecting my identity it has fees for @TMobile’s issue. make this make sense. They should cover it.

... @TMobile I have your T-Mobile revvl & service and last week I missed out on a kidney transplant because I didn't receive a voicemail message notification until five hours later and by then they moved down the list to someone else.

@art_lucero @TMobile @TMobileHelp I'm fed up with your service. I'm not receiving bank otps, short codes and banks/govt services are not accepting my no. they says its invalid. its really frustrating. Please change my no. I dont want to continue with tmobile
@RegulatorsPod T-mobile customer support
T-Mobile merging with Sprint was the catalyst for a lot of horrible things
T-Mobile ain’t that bad

@SamsungSupport As I stated, they've been unable to help. The agent couldn't book the T-mobile phone so had to get an unlocked one so she couldn't offer the $50 T-mobile credit, then the $250 Samsung credit was showing as $150 and I couldn't get the monthly fee as shown through T-mobile.

@mfgib197 @DollyParton @TMobile You must be ignorant to the history of both artists. I don’t watch Miley as much as I listen to her, and she’s got more talent on a bad day than any of these cheesy TV talent show winners have on a good, any day of the week.
@Jorge_Hinds @TMobile Perhaps they are still optimizing their network in my city or bad coverage in my area

company_posts.text: @JonFreier Hi, let's make sure your able to enjoy fast Wi-Fi on the flight. This page can help: https://t.co/GU6Teycy7Q. DM us if any challenges continue so we can help out. ^NevinBruce

company_posts.text: Our Rely plan still includes unlimited data for $35. You can compare plans here: https://t.co/hcXP20OkvK. ^NevinBruce

company_posts.text: Hi, Josh. We see your DM and we will meet you there ASAP! Thanks. ^NevinBruce
